78859a9e-ce46-49bc-8c90-f03b22ed5e3c.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

3ef3a636-380f-44cb-948e-22d27b7102ec.name: Oxygen Storage
3ef3a636-380f-44cb-948e-22d27b7102ec.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

4a990e1e-485f-49d7-9d4e-4b0bdf713407.name: Diffuse
4a990e1e-485f-49d7-9d4e-4b0bdf713407.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

9781b68e-b353-4cb9-9e10-3f29c002e26e.name: Homogenous
9781b68e-b353-4cb9-9e10-3f29c002e26e.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

818a93bf-8dee-47b2-9971-c2d3a14726db.name: No Blood
818a93bf-8dee-47b2-9971-c2d3a14726db.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

21a6913f-bd53-49da-b6ad-2149e0df8515.name: No Brain
21a6913f-bd53-49da-b6ad-2149e0df8515.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

254f2dc6-e31b-4974-8bf7-dd29da70034d.name: No Eyes
254f2dc6-e31b-4974-8bf7-dd29da70034d.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

dd831d22-ea10-4490-95ad-f8d99e0f9e97.name: No Head
dd831d22-ea10-4490-95ad-f8d99e0f9e97.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

6f95ebc7-beea-48ff-ab47-897b7b68ecc4.name: No Neck
6f95ebc7-beea-48ff-ab47-897b7b68ecc4.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

34975fe3-3c63-4981-8b8e-4ca5d1d07ed0.name: No Vitals
34975fe3-3c63-4981-8b8e-4ca5d1d07ed0.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

01f093c4-7f51-4e82-9884-adde3496d116.name: Unliving
01f093c4-7f51-4e82-9884-adde3496d116.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

ec40b662-e772-48ed-805c-14261a787116.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
ec40b662-e772-48ed-805c-14261a787116.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from others where being tidy or well-groomed would matter
to any Influence roll where being tidy or well-groomed would matter

ebaebbf8-bbb3-47b6-b051-4e3bb97b1851.name: Impulsiveness
ebaebbf8-bbb3-47b6-b051-4e3bb97b1851.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

d6d723d9-be31-4ec1-9779-0c1addfa6db6.name: Overconfidence
d6d723d9-be31-4ec1-9779-0c1addfa6db6.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

7334bc25-6a75-4f6d-9b37-89b085cf7e18.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
7334bc25-6a75-4f6d-9b37-89b085cf7e18.notes: You may fight  you may even start fights  but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not serious harm unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved  particularly if they are ordinary folks.

features.situation: from others except your own kind
from others of your own kind in an area, profession, or situation where your minority is especially rare

3b282645-faf7-4268-be5d-469b73fcfc7a.name: 7 - Choose one additional Skill from the following list:

4c8c4834-0e19-494f-94d3-850943ab87b2.text: 1,000 points Youre massively strong and deal out lots of damage; you also stand up to a lot of injury. Your combat style is brutally direct to match. Beyond your sheer physical toughness, you have the fortitude to go on fighting even when youre taking a beating.
